title: Recap, Reaction, and Highlights
desc: For the first time since 2019, Leon Draisaitl suited up in black, red, and yellow. Connor McDavid wasn’t the only Edmonton Oilers player to make his Olympic debut Thursday, as both Draisaitl and Josh Samanski played on Team Germany’s top line in a 3-1 win over Team Denmark in Group C action. It took less…

title: Margot Robbie Studied Rachel McAdams' 'Notebook' Audition
desc: Margot Robbie watched Rachel McAdams audition for 'The Notebook' every time before her own auditions.

title: Non-biologic Processes Can't Fully Explain the Organics Curiosity Found on Mars, Providing More Potential Evidence of Life.
desc: In a new study, researchers say that non-biological sources they considered could not fully account for the abundance of organic compounds in a sample collected on Mars by NASA’s Curiosity rover.

title: States Say No Thanks to Trump Tax Cuts, Drawing Republican Fire
desc: State income taxes often reflect federal policies, but Washington, D.C. and some states have taken steps to keep the latest Republican changes out of their tax codes.

title: Jack Pinnington Jones through to first ATP Tour quarter-final at Dallas Open
desc: Great Britain's Jack Pinnington Jones reaches his first ATP Tour quarter-final as he continues his superb run at the Dallas Open.

title: Stunning 4Q finish for Malaysia
desc: Malaysia's economy looks primed to smash expectations, with recent high-frequency data suggesting the growth appears capable of topping 6% in the fourth quarter of financial year 2025 (4Q25).

title: Man Utd women's player ratings vs Atletico Madrid: Maya Le Tissier stands tall as Red Devils dominate to put one foot in Champions League quarter-finals
desc: Manchester United took one huge step towards a first-ever Women's Champions League quarter-final on Thursday, with goals from Elisabeth Terland, Melvine Malard and Julia Zigiotti Olme delivering a 3-0 win over Atletico Madrid in Spain

title: Mahama departs Accra for AU Heads of State Summit in Addis Ababa
desc: President John Mahama has left Accra for Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, to attend the 39th Assembly of Heads of State and Government of the African Union.

title: Harry Styles announces pre-release listening party in Dublin for next album
desc: The 31-year-old singer will release Kiss All The Time. Disco, Occasionally on March 6.
